channel.title: Want to Be part of something amazing?
channel.description:
im just looking for someone to basicly, help me "moniter" the community, and advertise, and help out!. No java experience needed!
You will get staff position, maybe even co-owner.
Server is fully ready to be hosted.
I would like the server to become one of the "log in and pk" but also a big part skilling too!. The way it is now, is skilling, offers just as much economical support, as pking does. There is Pvm, and i will be adding more as time goes on, and we get more players. Pictures will be posted today. We have Custom Pk Sets, that you can buy with in-game gp. There is also hidden items sets, that when equiped together, will give advantages as 5% more damage or 5% faster exp.
[u][b] Msg on skype for more info[/b][/u]
Skype:chancewayneodeg

item.title: Want to Be part of something amazing?
item.dc:creator: @Chachai Chachai
item.description:
@Chachai wrote:

Yeah thanks, i’ve been busy updating server and such. I added more info and more to come will be soon! Pictures will be posted later today!

Read full topic
item.source: Want to Be part of something amazing?
